# BITCOIN-RAM

## Saves data for blocks and transactions
## Parse p2tr
# BITCOIN-RAM

1. Saves data for blocks and transactions
2. Parse p2tr
3. Integrated json

### example
#### decode p2tr
```shell
cleos push action ram.bitcoin decode '["20e8fa1365a752f83c2af2295c86992fb88ba82aaf53ded9b9e2345e93acacda3aac064579ffea8701750063036f7264010118746578742f706c61696e3b636861727365743d7574662d38003e7b2270223a226272632d3230222c226f70223a227472616e73666572222c227469636b223a2272617473222c22616d74223a22333430303030303030227d68"]' -p user
```

#### save block
```shell
cleos push action ram.bitcoin syncblock '[[{"height": 832554, "content":"{\"hash\":\"00000000000000000000d4231b61bef1122fd50db1cd8dc34dcf0bed5717f28c\",\"confirmations\":1,\"height\":832554,\"version\":661798912,\"versionHex\":\"27724000\",\"merkleroot\":\"fd5f0ef47360c885aeccb59cae42258bb7056f680766f22b6398bf5ca1107ec3\",\"time\":1709219376,\"mediantime\":1709216494,\"nonce\":2739358325,\"bits\":\"170371b1\",\"difficulty\":81725299822043.22,\"chainwork\":\"00000000000000000000000000000000000000006caaa9a1142786eba7023850\",\"nTx\":3987,\"previousblockhash\":\"0000000000000000000288e58a5704072f1ffa19f3794fa388760d7a12e2ae93\",\"strippedsize\":801333,\"size\":1588990,\"weight\":3992989}"}]]' -p user
```

#### save tx
```shell
cleos push action ram.bitcoin synctx '[832554, [{"id": 10,"content":"{\"txid\":\"f9469f79df4fdf4bc0a9f8663ede7575bf6afaeccd885a4da7d706fe1f2ed774\",\"hash\":\"1ac94c50978204e61e9b01ca509695ba45501430b4e3dac1066f82dfdb2518e1\",\"version\":2,\"size\":478,\"vsize\":247,\"weight\":985,\"locktime\":0,\"vin\":[{\"txid\":\"0e1453c67b1455540a709a4de980324d81ede4186841067acfc1f4ee582bd023\",\"vout\":0,\"scriptSig\":{\"asm\":\"\",\"hex\":\"\"},\"txinwitness\":[\"eb443e69ff3720976fec5e7faad0a0445b55159bcdb726a215a68b2792e749a77121bbddb903c326f12402d8b8bd4e7fc518b24b93e74da6c56a058cf678dddc\",\"20e8fa1365a752f83c2af2295c86992fb88ba82aaf53ded9b9e2345e93acacda3aac064579ffea8701750063036f7264010118746578742f706c61696e3b636861727365743d7574662d38003e7b2270223a226272632d3230222c226f70223a227472616e73666572222c227469636b223a2272617473222c22616d74223a22333430303030303030227d68\",\"c0a9856866d6fd6d52e378b6de3bc6a8b63d1d3e5953169272d8eac9068cf13789\"],\"sequence\":0},{\"txid\":\"e18be50cf19029e592124b7d3be882b84b3efb9728c9b113be1baed45384d1d7\",\"vout\":1,\"scriptSig\":{\"asm\":\"\",\"hex\":\"\"},\"txinwitness\":[\"e2d01d5e1564f85a56a46f405434fed4c3f6b17464bc577137e7dc04b8754be0693b8a7115ce80974ca6da41b42bdfa7f84406c6df25e13dd472c421ba124a03\"],\"sequence\":0}],\"vout\":[{\"value\":0.00000546,\"n\":0,\"scriptPubKey\":{\"asm\":\"OP_DUPOP_HASH16039afaaec0d713a074b3cecb00b4dcf9e5d80833dOP_EQUALVERIFYOP_CHECKSIG\",\"desc\":\"addr(16G1xYBbiNG78LSuZdMqp6tux5xvVp9Wxh)#cppf23v0\",\"hex\":\"76a91439afaaec0d713a074b3cecb00b4dcf9e5d80833d88ac\",\"address\":\"16G1xYBbiNG78LSuZdMqp6tux5xvVp9Wxh\",\"type\":\"pubkeyhash\"}},{\"value\":0.00394948,\"n\":1,\"scriptPubKey\":{\"asm\":\"1e8fa1365a752f83c2af2295c86992fb88ba82aaf53ded9b9e2345e93acacda3a\",\"desc\":\"rawtr(e8fa1365a752f83c2af2295c86992fb88ba82aaf53ded9b9e2345e93acacda3a)#69yf4kw3\",\"hex\":\"5120e8fa1365a752f83c2af2295c86992fb88ba82aaf53ded9b9e2345e93acacda3a\",\"address\":\"bc1parapxed82turc2hj99wgdxf0hz96s240200dnw0zx30f8t9vmgaql98ha0\",\"type\":\"witness_v1_taproot\"}}],\"fee\":0.00023685,\"hex\":\"\"}"}]]' -p user
```
